refractometer/type.documentation: Type of refractometer (differential, impulse, ...). Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic.

refractometer/channel.documentation: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic.

refractometer/channel/name.documentation: Short string identifier (unique for a given device). Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer.

refractometer/channel/description.documentation: Description, e.g. “channel viewing the upper divertor”. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer.

refractometer/channel/mode.documentation: Detection mode "X" or "O". Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer.

refractometer/channel/line_of_sight.documentation: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer.

refractometer/channel/line_of_sight/firs.documentation: Position of the first point. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point.

Major radius. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

Height. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point. Within first_point container: Position of the first point.

refractometer/channel/line_of_sight/seco.documentation: Position of the second point. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point.

Major radius. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Toroidal angle (oriented counter-clockwise when viewing from above). Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

Height. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within line_of_sight container: Description of the line of sight. The first point corresponds to the probing wave emission point. The second point corresponds to the probing wave detection point. Within second_point container: Position of the second point.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth.documentation: Set of frequency bandwidths. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/frequenc.documentation: Main frequency used to probe the plasma (before upshifting and modulating). Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/phase.documentation: Phase of the envelope of the probing signal, relative to the phase at launch. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/i_compon.documentation: I component of the IQ detector used to retrieve the phase of signal's envelope, sampled on a high resolution time_detector grid just before each measurement time slice represented by the ../time vector. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/q_compon.documentation: Q component of the IQ detector used to retrieve the phase of signal's envelope, sampled on a high resolution time_detector grid just before each measurement time slice represented by the ../time vector. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/n_e_line.documentation: Integral of the electron density along the line of sight, deduced from the envelope phase measurements. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

Data. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths. Within n_e_line container: Integral of the electron density along the line of sight, deduced from the envelope phase measurements.

Time. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths. Within n_e_line container: Integral of the electron density along the line of sight, deduced from the envelope phase measurements.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/phase_qu.documentation: In-phase and Quadrature components of the analysed signal. They are returned by an IQ-detector, that takes carrying and reference signals as the input and yields I and Q components. These are respectively stored as the first and the second index of the first dimension of the data child. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

Data. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths. Within phase_quadrature container: In-phase and Quadrature components of the analysed signal. They are returned by an IQ-detector, that takes carrying and reference signals as the input and yields I and Q components. These are respectively stored as the first and the second index of the first dimension of the data child.

Time. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths. Within phase_quadrature container: In-phase and Quadrature components of the analysed signal. They are returned by an IQ-detector, that takes carrying and reference signals as the input and yields I and Q components. These are respectively stored as the first and the second index of the first dimension of the data child.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/time_det.documentation: High sampling timebase of the IQ-detector signal measurements. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

refractometer/channel/bandwidth/time.documentation: Timebase for this bandwidth. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within bandwidth container: Set of frequency bandwidths.

refractometer/channel/n_e_line.documentation: Integral of the electron density along the line of sight, deduced from the envelope phase measurements. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer.

refractometer/channel/n_e_line/data.documentation: Data. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within n_e_line container: Integral of the electron density along the line of sight, deduced from the envelope phase measurements.

refractometer/channel/n_e_line/time.documentation: Time. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within n_e_line container: Integral of the electron density along the line of sight, deduced from the envelope phase measurements.

refractometer/channel/n_e_profile_approx.documentation: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer.

Analytical formula representing the electron density profile as a function of a radial coordinate and adjustable parameters f(rho_tor_norm, alpha1, ... alphaN). Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within n_e_profile_approximation container: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile.

Short string identifier. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within n_e_profile_approximation container: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile. Within formula container: Analytical formula representing the electron density profile as a function of a radial coordinate and adjustable parameters f(rho_tor_norm, alpha1, ... alphaN).

Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within n_e_profile_approximation container: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile. Within formula container: Analytical formula representing the electron density profile as a function of a radial coordinate and adjustable parameters f(rho_tor_norm, alpha1, ... alphaN).

Verbose description. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within n_e_profile_approximation container: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile. Within formula container: Analytical formula representing the electron density profile as a function of a radial coordinate and adjustable parameters f(rho_tor_norm, alpha1, ... alphaN).

Values of the formula's parameters alpha1, ..., alphaN. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic. Within channel container: Set of channels, e.g. different reception antennas of the refractometer. Within n_e_profile_approximation container: Approximation of the radial electron density profile with an array of parameters and an approximation formula, used by post-processing programs for the identification of the electron density profile.

refractometer/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between physical information received by the detector and data available on the real-time (RT) network. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic.

refractometer/time.documentation: Generic time. Within refractometer IDS: Density profile refractometer diagnostic.
